page.title: 15The village of Hunningham
page.content: Mr & Mrs Ellis live in a 3 storey house in{Hunningham.}They have lived in Hunningham since{1948}and are not planning on moving.Mrs Ellis said there have been alot of changes since she has been living there,such as the people that have worked on a farm now work in{Coventry}or{Leamington. Hunningham village had its own {bakehouse,}but it hasn't now.The population has risen a little but not much.There used to be a{school}in{1948 but it closed down in the{1960's,}the headmistress was called Mrs Hughes.Mrs Ellis said that the community had changed a lot. When she first lived in Hunningham she could take her dog for a walk around the block and meet many people,but now she doesn't even meet anyone and it only takes her 10 mins to walk round the block not 45 mins.
